Name: Wavesmasher Locomotive
Desc: This exquisite model of a toy train, adorned with an elegant bell is a scale reproduction of the Maritime Express.\nThe incredible cruising speed of the Maritime Express belies its adorable appearance, easily outpacing the fastest waves. When operating at high speeds, failing to follow all relevant rail regulations will significantly increase the risk of an accident, hence the conductor's reminder: "Please keep your head and arms inside the train at all times while the train is moving."
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
